step2.title: The five seats
step2.text: We have 5 seats available where you can join anytime you wish to talk. Whenever you feel that you finished your participation, free your seat so others can contribute too!

step3.title: How can I join a seat?
step3.text: Join and Leave a seat using the green and red buttons. And no worries, by leaving a seat you are still staying in the room hearing the others.

step4.title: Network with participants
step4.text: Find out more about the participants through their Linkedin and Twitter (if provided).
